data.title: Maya the Bee: The Golden Orb Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Peacock
data.meta_description: Maya the Bee: The Golden Orb is now available for streaming on Peacock. Read on to know more details about the movie.
data.meta_site_name: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
data.text:
Maya the Bee: The Golden Orb is an animated comedy showcasing the fascinating journey of a cheerful Bee Maya and her friend Willi. It is based on the 1975 anime Maya the Honey Bee and the book, The Adventures of Maya the Bee. It hit the screens on January 7, 2021.

Here’s how you can watch and stream the film via streaming services such as Peacock.

Is Maya the Bee: The Golden Orb available to watch via streaming?

Yes, Maya the Bee: The Golden Orb is available to watch via streaming on Peacock.

The film begins with Maya waking up Willy and her hive to celebrate the beauty of spring. Later, the duo are upset as they have to part ways due to their distratous partnership. They receive a chance to prove themselves which comes in the form of helping a green ant.

It features voiceovers from Benson Jack Anthony as Willy, Frances Berry as Rumba, Christian Charisiou as Bumblus, and many others.

Watch Maya the Bee: The Golden Orb streaming via Peacock

Maya the Bee: The Golden Orb is available to watch on Peacock.

Peacock is a streaming service offering a diverse range of content, including TV shows, movies, news, sports, and original programming.

You can watch via Peacock by following these steps:

Go to PeacockTV.com

Click ‘Get Started’

Choose your payment plan

$5.99 per month or $59.99 per year (premium)

$11.99 per month or $119.99 per year (premium plus

Create your account

Enter your payment details

Peacock’s Premium account provides access to over 80,000+ hours of TV, movies, and sports, including current NBC and Bravo Shows, along with 50 always-on channels. Premium Plus is the same plan but with no ads (save for limited exclusions), along with allowing users to download select titles and watch them offline and providing access to your local NBC channel live 24/7.

Maya the Bee: The Golden Orb’s synopsis is as follows:

”When Maya, a headstrong little bee, and her best friend Willi, rescue an ant princess they find themselves in the middle of an epic bug battle that will take them to strange new worlds and test their friendship to its limits.”

NOTE: The streaming services listed above are subject to change. The information provided was correct at the time of writing.
